# transfusion-pytorch (vendored)

This directory vendors code from `transfusion-pytorch` for use as a backbone in the OneFlow pipeline.

- Upstream repository: `https://github.com/lucidrains/transfusion-pytorch`
- Upstream paper: `https://arxiv.org/html/2408.11039`
- License: MIT (see `LICENSE` in the same folder)

We keep a copy of the upstream LICENSE and preserve attribution in the source headers.
